title: Conquering Irritable Bowel Syndrome
description: Jamie and Chris Buchanan live with IBS and have first-hand knowledge of what it takes to manage the condition. Their goal was to create an easy-to-read, informative guide on how to lessen or eliminate the symptoms. Conquering Irritable Bowel Syndrome includes information on IBS treatments (medicinal, natural and alternative), trigger foods, eating tips, exercise, stress and much more. Itâ€™s a must-read for people not only suffering from IBS, but also for their friends and families, and can help them to take back their lives and conquer their IBS.
author: Jamie  Buchanan
